entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
